          <title>
            <string language="en">Chemical apparatus for filtering mixtures</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chemischer Apparat für filternmischungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Appareil chimique pour les mélanges de filtrage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instrumento químico para misturas filtrando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Apparecchio chimico per le miscele di 
filtrazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χημικές συσκευές για τα μίγματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aparato químico para las mezclas de filtración</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Second of two illustrations, showing what some standard laboratory apparatus for filtering mixtures looks like. The other illustration shows the correct way to draw these.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">conical flask</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">filter funnel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">filter paper</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">filtrate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mixtures</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">residue</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solution</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeigend an zweiter Stelle von zwei Abbildungen, 
was irgendein Standardlaborapparat für filternmischungen wie 
aussieht. Die andere Abbildung zeigt die korrekte Methode, diese
zu zeichnen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En second lieu de deux illustrations, montrant à
ce que ressemble un certain appareil de laboratoire standard pour les 
mélanges de filtrage. L'autre illustration montre la voie 
correcte de dessiner ces derniers.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em segundo de duas ilustrações, mostrando o que
algum instrumento de laboratório padrão para misturas filtrando olha
como. A outra ilustração mostra a maneira correta desenhar 
estes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In secondo luogo di due illustrazioni, mostrando 
a che cosa qualche dispositivo di laboratorio standard per le miscele 
di filtrazione assomiglia. L'altra illustrazione mostra il modo 
corretto dissipare questi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεύτερη δύο απεικονίσεων, που εμφανίζουν τι κάποια 
πρότυπη εργαστηριακή συσκευή για τα μίγματα μοιάζει με. Η 
άλλη απεικόνιση εμφανίζει σωστό τρόπο να συρθούν αυτοί.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En segundo lugar de dos ilustraciones, mostrando 
lo que parece un poco de aparato de laboratorio estándar para las 
mezclas de filtración. La otra ilustración muestra la manera 
correcta de trazar éstos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erlenmeyerkolben</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Filtertrichter</string>
          </keyword>
